subset year 1996 and 2014
```{r}
data96_14 <- subset(combined, year == 1996 | year == 2014)
data96_14 <- data96_14[c("year","name","cc","racpp","rstpp","rpcpi","rgstpp")]

dt96_14 <- data96_14 %>%
  unite(all,cc,racpp,rstpp,rpcpi,rgstpp) %>%
  spread(key = year, value = all)

dt96_14 <- dt %>%
  separate(col = "1996", 
           into = c("cc.96","racpp.96","rstpp.96","rpcpi.96","rgstpp.96"),sep = "_") %>%
  separate(col = "2014", 
           into = c("cc.14","racpp.14","rstpp.14","rpcpi.14","rgstpp.14"),sep = "_")

for (i in 2:11) {
  dt96_14[,i] <- as.numeric(dt96_14[,i])
}
```

```{r}
fit.iv <- ivreg(I(log(cc.14) - log(cc.96)) ~ 
                  I(log(racpp.14) - log(racpp.96)) + I(log(rpcpi.14) - log(rpcpi.96))| 
                  I(rstpp.14-rstpp.96) + I(log(rpcpi.14) - log(rpcpi.96)), data = dt96_14)
summary(fit.iv)
coeftest(fit.iv, vcov = vcovHC(fit.iv, "HC1"))
```
